golden_sumscore.Description: Summary Score: For items 1, 2, 4 and 5, True    1 point; items 3, 6, and7, False    1 point.

MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Golden & Meehl's Seven MMPI Items Selected by Taxonomic Method

golden4.Description: 317. I am more sensitive than most other people.

golden5.Description: 284. I am sure I am being talked about.

golden1.Description: 61. I have not lived the right kind of life.

golden6.Description: 501. I usually work things out for myself rather than get someone to show me how.

golden7.Description: 207. I enjoy many different kinds of play and recreation.

golden2.Description: 239. I have been disappointed in love.
